clean_handle.description: Clean the handle to remove dirt and debris.

press_handle.description: Press the handle to test its functionality.

clean_suitcase_body.description: Clean the suitcase body to remove dirt and debris.

clean_whole_suitcase.description: Clean the entire suitcase including the suitcase body and handle.

rotate_and_press_handle.description: Rotate and press the handle to test its functionality.
